thread.section_title: Smith & Noble Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Smith & Noble | smithandnoble.com
thread.title: Mompantero

author: Mompantero
title: Mompantero
text: We ordered motorized roller blinds and honeycomb shades for the whole house. Initial order was with Nadine Lindley. On the phone with her for almost an hour as she walked us through measuring and the motorized system. Items arrived on time. One of the motorized shades was damaged in shipment. Spoke withCassandra Ramirez and she ordered the parts we needed. They arrived in 2 days. Blinds are working beautifully. Honeycombs all fit perfectly. Installed ourselves. This is the third house we used S&N. Great product and company.
